name: Temple of Twin Theurgy
description:
Created with 8 hours of work.

This is an adventure for D&D 5th edition and was designed for a party of 4th level characters. It sees the party being hired by the student of a defunct wizarding school to go back in for her and retrieve a powerful magic item.

This adventure contains

4 brand new monsters

1 brand new magic item

1 map of the Temple of Twin Theurgy
